metadata.name: Horses #1
metadata.description:
I was admiring the horses at the ranch, and an awe-inspiring display of the Northern Lights illuminated the sky. The horses, bathed in the ethereal light, took on the appearance of real-life unicorns.

I am thrilled to share this once-in-a-lifetime moment with you through my limited edition 'Sloika' NFT series, allowing you to own a piece of this magical experience.
